name: Gatholukk
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with pidgin loanwords
Diet centers on salted fish, seaweed, preserved mollusks
Ritual marking and small offerings common in commerce
constraints: No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: Small tidal harbor; causeway submerged at high tide
Population unknown; transient crews and seasonal laborers predominate
